Description: Fragment from rim of pottery mortarium, very slim profile. Yellow-beige clay, core light orange, fairly dense and hard. Graffito on inside of rim: ]νς ε[ retrograde.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (p. 61, pl. XXXII, no. 73)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 645, no. 34)
Villing 2006 / 'Drab Bowls' for Apollo: The Mortaria of Naukratis and Exchange in the Archaic Eastern Mediterranean (no. 14)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (HA.16)
